member.name: T:Property.PropertyExtensionsChains
member.summary: Contains words that can be applied to property instances.

member.name: M:Property.PropertyExtensionsChains.OnChanging``1(Property.IProperty{``0},System.Action)

summary.para: Create a new PropertyChanging event subscription.
( ! ) Don't forget to dispose of it.

member.param: Tell me what I should do when the event is raised.

member.name: M:Property.PropertyExtensionsChains.OnChanging``1(Property.IProperty{``0},System.Func{Property.ICallDriven})

summary.para: Create a new PropertyChanging event subscription.
( ! ) Don't forget to dispose of it.

member.param: Tell me what object to call when the event is raised.

summary.para: Create a new PropertyChanging event subscription.
